Articles.Content: Just found this DDS export plugin for photoshop on Macs. This has been a bit of a problem for us Mac users since the Nvidia plugin is windows only. This nice fellow [here](https://fnordware.blogspot.com/2014/09/dds-plug-in-for-after-effects-and.html) decided to make an open source version ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

THANK YOU SO MUCH! YOU MADE MY DAY!

uncaps

> 
> THANK YOU SO MUCH! YOU MADE MY DAY!
> uncaps

Yeah man, I was so excited when I found this!
